wo["SlopeStrength"] = 0.4 wo["ConserveLevel"] = false
ti[" "] = {"fl_rock", _flood = "~"} ti["~"] = {"fl_water", "water#"} ti["-"] = {"fl_wood_framed", "wood#"} .. ti{"st_nil"} ti["#"] = {"st_plop"} .. ti{"fl_stone"} ti["M"] = {"st_mail_n"} ti["X"] = {"st_grate_cross"} .. ti{"fl_slope_pn"} ti["Y"] = {"st_grate_cross"} ti["1"] = {"st_switch", target = "switch_call", instant = true} ti["2"] = {"st_switch", target = "sensor_call", instant = true} ti["B"] = {"st_box"} .. ti{"fl_rock", _flood = "-"} ti["O"] = {"st_oxyd", flavor = "b"} ti["T"] = {"st_timer", target = "check_pipe_exit", interval = 0.01} ti["s"] = ti["X"] .. {"it_sensor", target = "sensor_call", invisible = true} ti["@"] = {"#ac_marble"} ti["%"] = ti["X"] .. {"it_banana", "pipe_exit"} .. ti{"#ac_marble_white", "white_marble"}
wo(ti, " ", { "####################", "# #B#", "TM# #B#", "#s# #BO", "#X# @ #B#", "#X# #B#", "#X# Y1 #B#", "#X# #B#", "#X# #B#", "#X# #BO", "#X# #B#", "#%2 BB#", "####################"})
pipes = {"it_pipe_ns", "it_pipe_ew", "it_pipe_sw", "it_pipe_es", "it_pipe_ne", "it_pipe_nw"}
for _, entry in pairs(pipes) do ti[entry] = {entry} end
function setwater(x,y) if fl(x,y)._flood then wo[{x,y}] = ti[fl(x,y)._flood] end end
function setwood(x,y) if -st(x,y) and st(x,y):is("st_box") then setwater(x,y) end end
pipe_exit = no["pipe_exit"] white_marble = no["white_marble"]
function check_pipe_exit(is_on, sender) if not po(pipe_exit):exists() then return end local pos = po(pipe_exit) wo[pos] = {"it_burnable"} -- no further pipe pieces may be added setwater(pos.x, pos.y) sender.state = OFF wo:add({"ot_timer", interval = 0.51, target = "flood"}) end
function flood(is_on, sender) water_floors = no["water#*"] wood_floors = no["wood#*"] for floor in water_floors do floor.name = "" local x, y = floor:xy() setwater(x-1,y) setwater(x+1,y) setwater(x,y+1) setwater(x,y-1) if random(1,3) == 1 then setwater(x+1,y+1) end if random(1,3) == 1 then setwater(x+1,y-1) end if random(1,3) == 1 then setwater(x-1,y+1) end if random(1,3) == 1 then setwater(x-1,y-1) end end for floor in wood_floors do floor.name = "" local x, y = floor:xy() setwood(x-1,y) setwood(x+1,y) setwood(x,y+1) setwood(x,y-1) end end
function switch_call() if wo["IsDifficult"] then wo[{9, 6}] = ti[pipes[random(1,6)]] else wo[{9, 6}] = ti[pipes[random(1,5)]] end end
function sensor_call() wo["SlopeStrength"] = 10 end
